CustomField.inlineHelpText: Would you like to increase your planâ€™s forceout threshold from $1,000 to $5,000? See section 35. D. in your adoption agreement to confirm current force-out threshold.
CustomField.label: ForceOutThresholdChange

value.fullName: No: Our plans threshold is already $5,000 OR we would like to keep it at $1,000
value.label: No: Our plans threshold is already $5,000 OR we would like to keep it at $1,000

value.fullName: Yes: Amend the plan and increase our force-out threshold to $5,000 ($195 Plan Amendment Fee)
value.label: Yes: Amend the plan and increase our force-out threshold to $5,000 ($195 Plan Amendment Fee)
